name: Peloton Interactive, Inc.
description: Peloton Interactive, Inc. is a leading technology-driven fitness company that revolutionized home fitness through its innovative and interactive exercise equipment and subscription-based fitness content. Founded in 2012 by John Foley, Peloton has created a community-oriented platform that combines high-quality fitness equipment, such as its popular stationary bike and treadmill, with an immersive and engaging digital experience. Users can participate in live and on-demand classes led by world-class instructors, fostering a sense of community and competition among members. Peloton's mission is to empower people to be the best version of themselves through fitness, and it offers a wide range of classes, including cycling, running, strength training, yoga, and meditation. With a growing library of content, the company has expanded its offerings to include a variety of training programs and wellness resources, catering to users of all fitness levels. Peloton has also embraced a subscription model that enhances user engagement and retention. As a pioneer in the connected fitness space, Peloton continues to innovate, introducing new features and equipment to enhance the user experience and maintain its competitive edge in the rapidly evolving fitness industry.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA

seo.meta_title: Peloton Interactive, Inc. | The Leader in Connected Fitness
seo.meta_description: Explore Peloton Interactive, Inc., a pioneer in connected fitness. Discover Peloton's innovative products and services that empower people to achieve their fitness goals.

faq.question: What does Peloton offer?
faq.answer: Peloton offers high-quality fitness equipment and a subscription service for live and on-demand workout classes.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Peloton?
faq.answer: Barry McCarthy is the CEO of Peloton Interactive, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Peloton headquartered?
faq.answer: Peloton is headquartered in New York City, New York, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products of Peloton?
faq.answer: Peloton's main products include the Peloton Bike, Peloton Bike+, Peloton Tread, and various fitness subscriptions.
